import React,{useState} from 'react' import MenuBase from './MenuBase' const AdminShajiDashMenuCreate = () => { const [values, setValues] = useState({ name:"", formData:"", price:"", type:"", category:"", loading:false, error:"", success:false, createdProduct:false }) const handleChange = name => event => { setValues({...values,[name]:event.target.value}) } const {name,formData,price,type,category,loading,error,success,createdProduct} = values const successMessage = () => (

{createdProduct} created successfully

); return (
Food pic
) } export default AdminShajiDashMenuCreate;
